amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds for the implementation of a new HHS policy announced on June 5, 2019, that would restrict fetal tissue research.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 116-111 to prohibit the implementation of a new HHS policy announced on June 5, 2019, that would restrict fetal tissue research.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pocan amendment (A073) Agreed to by recorded vote: 225 - 193 (Roll no. 321).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pocan amendment (A073) Agreed to by recorded vote: 225 - 193 (Roll no. 321).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A073) offered by Mr. Pocan.
